command.upload.no_disc: §cYou must be holding a music disc!
command.upload.no_permission: §cYou don't have permission to use this command!
command.upload.url_protocol: §cURL must start with http:// or https://
command.upload.success: §a✓ Audio successfully applied to disc in hand!
command.info.no_disc: §cYou must be holding a music disc!
command.info.title: §7Title: §f%s
command.clear.no_disc: §cYou must be holding a music disc!
tooltip.title: Title: %s
command.youtube.yt_dlp_required: §7yt-dlp is required on the server for YouTube support
command.rename.no_disc: §cYou must be holding a music disc!
command.help.upload: §f/audiodisc upload <url> §7- Upload audio from URL to disc
command.help.detail.upload:
§6/audiodisc upload <url>
§7Downloads audio from a direct URL and applies it to the music disc in your hand.
§7Supported formats: MP3, OGG, WAV, FLAC
§7Example: §f/audiodisc upload https://example.com/audio.mp3
command.help.detail.youtube:
§6/audiodisc youtube <url>
§7Downloads audio from a YouTube video and applies it to the disc.
§7Requires yt-dlp to be installed on the server.
§7Example: §f/audiodisc youtube https://youtube.com/watch?v=...
command.help.detail.rename:
§6/audiodisc rename title <text>
§7Changes the display name of the disc in your hand.
§7Example: §f/audiodisc rename title My Favorite Song

§6/audiodisc rename lore <text>
§7Sets the description text shown in the disc tooltip.
§7Supports color codes with & (e.g., &4 for red, &a for green).
§7Example: §f/audiodisc rename lore &6Epic &cbattle music

§6/audiodisc rename music_name <text>
§7Changes the music track name (like vanilla 'Lena Raine - otherside').
§7Example: §f/audiodisc rename music_name Artist Name - Song Title
command.help.detail.info:
§6/audiodisc info
§7Shows detailed information about the custom audio on the disc in your hand.
§7Displays: title, format, duration, bitrate, uploader, file size
command.help.detail.clear:
§6/audiodisc clear
§7Removes custom audio from the disc in your hand.
§7The disc will return to its original state.
command.help.detail.reload:
§6/audiodisc reload
§7Reloads the mod configuration from disk.
§7Requires operator permissions (level 3).
command.help.detail.lang:
§6/audiodisc lang create <code>
§7Creates a custom language file for translation.
§7Example: §f/audiodisc lang create en_us

§6/audiodisc lang list
§7Lists all available language files.
